results.description: Australia captain Mark Milligan joins League One club Southend United on an initial one-year deal.

results.description: This is how you rated the players' performances out of 10 in the Fifa Women's World Cup game between Australia and Italy.
results.title: Your ratings - Australia v Italy

results.description: Australia captain Mark Milligan is to leave Hibernian after Sunday's final game of the campaign at home to Aberdeen.
results.shortTitle: Milligan to exit Hibs after one season
results.title: Mark Milligan: Australia captain to leave Hibernian after one season

thumbnail.altText: Mark Milligan is leaving Hibs halfway through a two-year contract

results.description: Muy cerca de la superficie, bajo las raíces de un árbol, se escondía una gigantesca pepita de oro de 72 kilos y 61 cm de largo. Fueron dos mineros británicos los que la encontraron, y se hicieron ricos de la noche a la mañana.
results.title: La historia de “Welcome Stranger”, la pepita de oro más grande del mundo que fue encontrada hace 150 años

results.description: Australia forward Awer Mabil reveals his trademark goal celebration is a message of support for people living with mental illness.
results.shortTitle: Mabil celebration is for mental health
results.title: Awer Mabil: Australia forward is hoping to raise awareness of mental illness

results.description: Celtic midfielder Tom Rogic is rested as a "precaution" in Australia's 5-0 friendly win over Oman in Dubai.
results.shortTitle: Celtic's Rogic rested in Australia win
results.title: Tom Rogic: Celtic player rested in Australia friendly victory over Oman

results.description: Injured Huddersfield midfielder Aaron Mooy is named in Australia's 23-man squad for next month's Asian Cup.
results.title: Aaron Mooy: Huddersfield midfielder in Australia's Asian Cup squad despite injury

results.description: Hibernian winger Martin Boyle is praised by Australia coach Graham Arnold after scoring twice in his first start for Australia.
results.title: Martin Boyle: 'Fantastic' Hibs winger scores twice in first Australia start

results.description: Hibs winger Martin Boyle is included in Australia's squad for their upcoming friendly against Korea after receiving clearance.
results.shortTitle: Australia include Hibs' Boyle in squad
results.title: Martin Boyle: Australia include Hibs winger in squad for Korea friendly

results.description: Former Liverpool goalkeeper Brad Jones says there are "no major issues" after he was left unconscious for several minutes during a game on Friday.
results.shortTitle: Ex-Liverpool keeper OK after head injury
results.title: Brad Jones: Ex-Liverpool goalkeeper discharged from hospital after head injury

results.description: Awer Mabil grew up in a Kenyan refugee camp. Last month he scored his first international goal on his debut for Australia. This is his story.
results.shortTitle: From mud hut to international goalscorer
results.title: Awer Mabil: From living in a mud hut at a refugee camp to scoring for Australia

results.description: Martin Boyle will be able to choose between playing for Australia or Scotland, believes Hibernian boss Neil Lennon.
results.shortTitle: Boyle may choose Scotland or Australia - Lennon
results.title: Martin Boyle may choose to play for Scotland or Australia - Neil Lennon

results.description: Australia's record goalscorer Tim Cahill signs for Indian Super League side Jamshedpur FC.
results.shortTitle: Cahill joins Indian Super League club
results.title: Tim Cahill: Australia's record goalscorer joins Jamshedpur FC

results.description: Australia winger Daniel Arzani is expected to join Celtic on loan after he joins Manchester City from Melbourne City.
results.shortTitle: Arzani set to join Celtic from Man City
results.title: Daniel Arzani: Celtic to take winger from Man City after Melbourne City switch

results.description: Australia international defender James Meredith signs a new "long-term" contract with Championship side Millwall.
results.title: James Meredith: Millwall defender signs new 'long-term' contract

results.description: Watch all the best action and funnies from day 13 of the 2018 World Cup in Russia, as Lionel Messi finally makes his mark on the tournament just when Argentina needed him most.
results.shortTitle: World Cup Catch-up: Messi finally makes his mark
results.title: Lionel Messi makes his mark - World Cup Catch-up

results.description: Peru record their first victory at a World Cup for 40 years as they beat Australia, to the delight of their emotional supporters.
results.shortTitle: Pure Peruvian emotion after long-awaited win
results.title: World Cup 2018: Peru fans celebrate after 2-0 win over Australia

thumbnail.altText: Pure Peruvian emotion after historic victory

results.description: Peru record their first win at a World Cup finals since 1978 as they beat Australia in the last match of the tournament for both sides.
results.shortTitle: Peru win first World Cup game in 40 years
results.title: World Cup 2018: Peru beat Australia 2-0 to win first finals match for 40 years

results.description: Watch highlights as Peru earn their first World Cup victory for 40 years as they beat Australia in the last match of the tournament for both sides.
results.title: World Cup 2018: Australia 0-2 Peru highlights

results.description: Andre Carrillo strikes a superb volley for Peru's first goal of the 2018 World Cup during their 2-0 win over Australia in the final round of Group C fixtures.
results.shortTitle: Carrillo volley gives Peru their first goal of 2018 World Cup
results.title: World Cup 2018: Andre Carrillo volleys Peru ahead against Australia
